messages.subject: Know of any good educational CD-ROMS?
messages.msgSnippet: Here is a site where you can get great software for free (basically you pay just shipping $3.95)...We ve gotten quite a few and my 4yo loves them...you can
messages.messageBody:
Here is a site where you can get great software for free (basically you pay
just shipping $3.95)...We've gotten quite a few and my 4yo loves them...you
can find software for most ages (from 3-14).
www.smart-estore.com/art
ENJOY!


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Know of any good educational CD-ROMS?
messages.msgSnippet: We took out of the library I SPY and it is pretty good. Do you know of any other games like that? Also, has anybody tried JUMPSTART PHONICS?
messages.messageBody:
We took out of the library I SPY and it is pretty good.
Do you know of any other games like that?
Also, has anybody tried JUMPSTART PHONICS?
